description: Silence is golden. If you need more silence in your life, all you need is this skill. Just use one of the example phrases to get started, and your life will be more peaceful in no time. Due to limitations in the Alexa Skills Kit, the maximum silence duration is limited to 90 seconds at this time.
exampleInteractions: Alexa, ask silence is golden for twenty seconds of silence.
Alexa, tell silence is golden to give me three seconds of silence
name: Silence is golden
shortDescription: Silence is golden. If you need more silence in your life, this is for you.
